duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive financial results in store to meet and exceed plan, including Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s).
Lead by example at all times and consistently role model and promote exceptional customer service with the team and clients.
Proactively anticipate staffing needs, including sourcing and selecting talent to deliver business objectives.
Implement door development plans and schedule support to address business growth needs.
Establish and develop a cooperative and mutually respectful relationship with the entire store team.

education_certification.credential: 3 plus years of Beauty industry experience and 3 plus years of Beauty retail management.
